knimeNode.name: Peak Threshold Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Removes peaks from the chosen MS scans. User must configure the data files to be processed (names of the files are obtained from the input table) and the peak filtering method desired.
knimeNode.fullDescription: Removes peaks from the chosen MS scans. User must configure the data files to be processed (names of the files are obtained from the input table) and the peak filtering method desired. The data is sent to an MSConvertEE server for processing and the results loaded into the table, in a format as requested by the user.

ports.inPort: An input table with URLs or file locations for the input files in a single column
ports.outPort: A table in the chosen format for downstream nodes to process
